title: Welcome to My Blog
content: This is the first post on my blog. I'll be sharing insights on web development, programming, and my projects! I can't wait to make more posts and share my thoughts with the world!

title: Learning Async JavaScript
content: Today, I dove into asynchronous JavaScript concepts. Promises and async/await have changed how I handle asynchronous code.

title: New Project: Raspberry Pi Car
content: I'm building a Raspberry Pi-powered car that maps out rooms using SLAM. Stay tuned for updates on its progress!
